Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Woodlawn.
ShortDescription: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island then resume their normal route on 67th, due to fire department activity near 67th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays near Chicago due to earlier fire department activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays near Chicago due to earlier fire department activity.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
